name: QUARIUM
description:
Found an old Aquarium on GregsList,

You have ten dollars,

Go buy a fish.

Huh?

Want more fish?

No more cash?

Go earn some...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In QUARIUM you are tasked with growing a personal collection of sea creatures. Each creature can be evolved to a third evolution through feeding.  With higher evolution, more cash can be produced to expand your compendium of sea life! Generate income and feed your ocean dwellers to up their motivation.

Take a passion of pets and turn it into a monster profit. *marketing fish are beginning to school*
